title: Russia, China Block U.N. Effort To Investigate Syrian War Crimes
teaser: Russia and China have vetoed a U.N. Security Council resolution that would have referred the war in Syria to the International Criminal Court. Russia called the vote a publicity stunt. Nearly 60 nations backed the effort, which gained steam after a defector provided photographs detailing the mass killing and torture of prisoners under Bashar Al Assad's regime.
